name: DimisFunbox
description:
The digital toy project was developed during the Patient73 Game Jam.

The aim was to provide a Sandbox that's providing a versatile functionality through very simple controls to offer high accessibility for players who're affected by rare diseases that may be causing trouble in video gaming.
Additionally through the messages that can be found at the "Help" button it is aiming to spread awareness of rare diseases out there that cause difficulties on a variety of people who are prevented from the disease that affects them,  from experiencing life in the average person's full health.
All you need is your mouse and a functioning left click button.
It can also be played on a touchscreen device since all you need to do is touch things around.
Best recommended settings for a touch device are to rotate your device to Landscape orientation (horizontally)
Go easy on the usage of magnets, too many of them drop frames quite fast :)

I hope you find as much peace playing around with it, as I found in testing it! ❤

The project offers support for 6 Languages

  • Chinese
  • English
  • Germany
  • Greek
  • Japanese
  • Spanish
The features I didn't manage to finish in time for the submission:
 - Create The Spinner Tile
- Create The Spring Platform Tile
 - Create The Conveyor Belt Tile

Thank you a lot for playing! I'm open to feedback :)

Best wishes and stay safe and healthy ❤,
Dimitrios Kitsikidis
